body:
Add v0.935 to Angsd which includes multiple bugs fixes. 

**Changelog:**
- Refactor of argument parsing system.
- Add support for VCF
- Fixed memory leak in vcf-gp reader if vcf-pl or vcf-gl was chosen.

Full changelog can be found [here](https://github.com/ANGSD/angsd/compare/0.933...0.935).

**Test Plan:**
Angsd v0.925 built successfully within the Autamus workflow [here](https://github.com/autamus/registry/pull/731/checks?check_run_id=3622152736).
title: Add v0.935 to Angsd
